name: 4.22 "Diane Chambers' Day" Trivia Game | 'Cheers'- Season 4 | 10 Questions

questions.text: What did the fill in waitress say they called Norm at the Hungry Heifer?
options: the cool guy who drinks beer
questions.explanation:
that guy who comes back.

	Norm's favorite place to eat was the Hungry Heifer. He admits that the food is not very healthy however.

questions.text: Which child of Carla's called Carla at Cheers?
questions.explanation:
Ann Marie.

	Carla recognized which child it was by how she sounded. However, when her daughter asked she said it wasn't because of her ugly voice.

Dennis.

	Dennis was very effeminate so everyone made fun of Diane after he left. Woody called him Denise. Dennis was played by Tom Harrison.

questions.text: What did Frasier say about Mrs. Benedict?
questions.explanation:
"even her beep is whinny".

	Frasier was upset because he was about to go out with Cliff and Norm. He told them he'd have to catch up to them later.

questions.text: What movie did the gang watch at Sam's house?
questions.explanation:
"The Magnificent Seven".

	Diane wanted to be invited but wasn't. She said after all the years she's been there she still felt like an alien. Carla replied, "Well if the antenna fits".

questions.text: What did they go see with and for Diane?
questions.explanation:
opera.

	The gang was not to thrilled about going when Frasier suggested it but they did go. It was Woody's job to keep everyone awake.

questions.text: Who didn't go with the others and Diane?
questions.explanation:
Carla.

	Carla said that operas reminded her too much of her family reunions. Diane later thanked Carla for not going thinking it was part of the surprise.

questions.text: What did Cliff bring as "opera glasses"?
questions.explanation:
binoculars.

	Diane asked if anyone needed opera glasses when Cliff said "I brought a pair of my own there Diane". He told Norm that they were very powerful.

questions.text: Who stayed awake throughout the performance?
questions.explanation:
No one.

	Woody said he wore extra tight shoes and took a nap so he'd stay awake. Diane loved the opera but no one managed to stay awake through the entire thing.

questions.text: What did Sam tell Diane about the evening?
questions.correct: that Frasier set it up not him
options: that Frasier wanted to come but Sam wouldn't let him because Sam was still in love with Diane
that he was originally going to take her to a boxing match
questions.explanation:
that Frasier set it up not him.

	Sam and Diane were planning to go back to Sam's place when Sam confesses. He expected Diane to turn him down when she found out but instead it only made her want to go even more.
